content: and your bor marks the start of the front of the leg knit one round then move to the leg chart for your size they can be found on pages 6 7 8 the leg chart only shows half of the leg stitches and so will be worked twice in order to encircle your leg entirely complete the 66 rounds of the chart and wait for clue 3 this is the end of clue two flag for dumfriesshire scotland flag for kirkcudbrightshire scotland scottish flag copyright robin e johnston 2025 5 heritage surprise copyright robin e johnston 2025 6 heritage surprise copyright robin e johnston 2025 7 heritage surprise copyright robin e johnston 2025 8 heritage surprise you have just completed round 66 of the leg you will now be creating the heel flap and gusset heel flap knit one complete round then knit across the first 28 32 36 sts the of the round you will then put these sts on hold until you begin the gusset you will now be working with the final 28 32 36 sts of the round for the heel flap row 1 rs sl 1 wyib k1 to end of row row 2 ws sl1 wyif purl to end of row repeat row 1 and 2 until heel flap is 28 32 36 row long ending after a ws row there will be 14 16 18 selvedge stitches along each side of the heel flap turn heel you will now be working short row across the heel flap stitches to create the bottom of the heel row 1 rs sl1 wyib k 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn work row 2 ws sl1 wyif p7 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 sl1 wyib k to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn work row 4 sl1 wyif p to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn work repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches have been worked you should now have 18 20 22 sts on your needle and are ready to work a rs row gusset you will now pick up stitches along each side of the heel flap and resume working in the round knit 18 20 22 heel stitches pick up and knit 14 16 18 sts along selvedge edge of the heel flap plus an extra stitch to close the gap knit across the instep pick up and knit one extra stitch to close the gap and 14 16 18 sts along selvedge edge of heel flap knit 9 10 11 heel stitches and pm to mark new bor at the midpoint of the heel which will become the middle of the sole 76 86 96 sts you will now begin working gusset decreases every other round round 1 k to 3 sts before start of instep k2tog k1 knit across instep k1 ssk k to bor 2 sts decreased round 2 k around to bor repeat gusset rounds 1 and 2 until you have 28 32 36
